pkgmetadata.longdescription:
WebRTC JavaScript videoconferencing client
Jitsi Meet is a WebRTC JavaScript/WASM application that uses Jitsi Videobridge to provide high quality, scalable videoconferencing.
This package provides the web-server root filestructure needed to distribute this application, installed at /usr/share/jitsi-meet.
The tree is taken directly from Jitsi's corresponding upstream deb; no server-side native binaries are requried, so this is safe to do. The web structure may be built via npm, for those interested, following the istructions at e.g.: https://github.com/jitsi/jitsi-meet/blob/master/doc/manual-install.md#deploy-jitsi-meet
